title: tElisO illa
sahitya:
tEliso illa muLugiso ninna pAlige biddeno parama krpALO


caraNam 1    sati suta dhanadAse entemba mOhadi hitadinda ati nondu beNDAdeno 
gati koDuvara kANe matiya pAliso lakshmIpati ninna caraNada smaraNeyittenage
    caraNam 2    jare rOga dAridrya kalmashaventemba sharadhiyoLage biddu muLugidEnO 
sthiravalla dEhavu nere nambide ninna karuNAbhayavittu pAliso hariye
    caraNam 3    dOSayuLLava nAnu bhASeyuLLava nInu mOsa hOdeno bhakti rasava biTTu 
shESa shayana shrI purandara viTTalane dAsara sangavittu pAliso hariye
